EmailTemplate.description: Auto-response when new case is submitted online (e-NDA).
EmailTemplate.name: Communities: Forgot Password Email HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: Your new u-blox password
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Receiving_User.Username},
This is the link you can use to change the password for your u-blox account: {!Community_Url}
This link is valid for the next 7 days. After that please go to the reset password section to get a new link. If you didnâ€™t request a new password, please ignore this email.
Kind regards,
Your u-blox team
